title: Patriot Front Replaces Lawyer of Choice With Extremist
description: Patriot Front members have replaced their former first-choice lawyer Brent Gleason with Jason Lee Van Dyke in recent months, according to court documents, leaked chats, sources with knowledge of the groupâ€™s internal workings, and online materials reviewed by Hatewatch.
dc:creator: Jeff Tischauser and Jason Wilson
